line: Oi！ You sure you wandered into the right hole?
200 measly bucks to start—try finding another benefactor this generous outside, I dare you.
【Movement: WASD】
Money’s for stocking the pantry, obviously!
You’re asking me what to buy?
Figure it out yourself—surprise me.
【Click arrows to adjust order quantity】
【Purchase the ingredients listed on the preorder form】
What a flawless shopping list!
Pre-made? It’s the only way to turn a profit—deal with it.
【Click New Day to start business】
I suppose you can open shop.
Look at  today's orders—closely.
【Click the ingredients matching the order to heat them in the microwave】
Stop staring into space—one more second on that heat and it’s scorched!
【Click ON/OFF when the timer needle enters the highlighted zone to stop heating】
Guess that’s passable
Surplus, huh? Guess I should hand you the keys to the whole joint.
【Click arrows to adjust order quantity】
Right, one decent piece of kit... mm, make-or-break for cuisine.
【Purchase upgrade modules from the vending machine to enhance microwave performance】
Remember—you're lining your own pockets here.
